title: Tabby Health Benefits Package
content: Tabby offers comprehensive health benefits for all full-time feline employees. Our CatCare+ plan includes annual veterinary check-ups, dental cleanings, flea and tick prevention, and coverage for unexpected medical issues. We also provide mental health support through our Purr-fect Mind program, offering access to certified animal behaviorists. Full-time employees are eligible for benefits after a 30-day probation period. All employees have access to our on-site grooming station and quiet rooms for mid-day naps. Additional benefits include vision care with annual eye exams, preventative hairball treatment, and our wellness program featuring yoga and meditation sessions.
